title: Manage access via application tokens
tokenParagraphe1: Your data and business security is paramount. This is why you are required to provide additional authentication when using AI Tools.
tokenParagraphe2: Tokens are unique authentication tokens. They allow you to access your notebooks, jobs and apps in a granular way, for example by selecting by label.
tokenParagraphe3: Tokens are specific to AI Tools.
formAddTokenFieldLabelDescription: Tokens can be assigned to a specific resource (AI Notebook, Job and App) using the label selectors, or to all your resources by leaving the field empty. You can also specify token privileges to include administrative or read-only rights.
formAddTokenDefaultLabelsDescription: By default, your applications will have the following labels:
formAddTokenFieldRoleInfo: Choose an Administrator or Operator role (easy to use)
formAddTokenFieldRegionInfo: Region for which the token will be active
formTokenNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores or dashes, must not start with a dash.
formTokenLabelErrorPattern: The via label selector must have the following form: label=value
formTokenToastSuccessDescription: Your token has been generated successfully
formTokenCopy: Your token has been copied successfully
formTokenToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred generating your token
deleteTokenDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ name }} token?
deleteTokenToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred deleting your token
renewTokenToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred regenerating your token
renewTokenCopy: Your token has been copied successfully
renewTokenDescription: Are you sure you want to regenerate the {{ name }} token?
renewTokenSuccess: Here is the new value of your token, save it:
